sense.name: remove water from
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent] DEHYDRATE NP2[patient] (PP[instrument]) NP1[patient] DEHYDRATE Often used adjectivally.
sense.examples: All this exercise and sweating has dehydrated me. In the desert, you get dehydrated very quickly. Our blood gets thicker as we dehydrate. Tea and coffee further dehydrate you because they are diuretics. I eat many fresh but also dehydrate them in my Gardenmaster Food Dehydrator.
